summary: A lonely boy wins over his distant father and strict grandmother with help from a brave velveteen rabbit whose one wish is to become a real rabbit someday.
cast: Jane Seymour|Tom Skerritt|Ellen Burstyn|Matthew Harbour|Kevin Jubinville|Michael Sinelnikoff|Una Kay|Michel Perron|Walter Massey|Renee Madeline Le Guerrier|Jane Gilchrist|Frances Brady-Stewart|Jesse Camacho|Steven Crowder|James Harbour|Harrison Kreisberg|Claude-Henri Breton|Jordan Drisdelle|Andrea Sadler|Max Whitaker|Chandler Wakefield|Wendee Lee|Tanya Barkdull
keywords: animal character name as title|child|the velveteen rabbit character|three word title|rabbit
title: El conejo de terciopelo
